text: Hagi Nagra noti kazigatima e'naza sondia vahetamina zamahe vararisanuge'za hagege kokampi vugahaze. Hagi tamavugama mani'naza sondia vahetamina zamarotago hanuge'za zage hanati kaziga Fri hagerimpi urami vagaregahaze. Hagi kamefima mani'naza sondia vahetamina zamarotago hanuge'za zage fre kaziga Mediterenia hagerimpi uramigahaze. Ana hanugeno zamavufagamo'ma kasri'nia zamo'a tusi'a himna vuno ama mopa refitegahie. Tamage Ra Anumzamo'a raza erifore hu'ne.
